name: Sam (iwolga, SorA12)
description:
Join Sam in her adventure through fantasy world.

Controlls
Keyboard:
Movement - A,D / Arrows
Jump - Spacebar
Next dialog line - E/Spacebar
Menu orientation: Arrows + Enter

Xbox:
Movement - Left stick / D-pad
Jump - A
Next dialog line - A
Menu orientation: Left stick / D-pad + A

Assets used:
Most art from:
https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-platformer-assets

Sounds:
https://opengameart.org/content/rockbreaking
https://opengameart.org/content/storm-siren
